languages.text: "Извольте обратить внимание, Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа} — для ответа нужно взять лист бумаги и вставить в отверстие. Затем коснитесь вот этого камня и громко задайте свой вопрос".

"If I may advise the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}... In order to receive an answer, one should take a piece of paper and slide it into the hole here. Then, touch this stone and ask the question loudly and clearly."
languages.original_text: "Извольте обратить внимание, Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа} — для ответа нужно взять лист бумаги и вставить в отверстие. Затем коснитесь вот этого камня и громко задайте свой вопрос".

traits.locale_text: "If I may advise the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}… In order to be answered, one should take a piece of paper and slide it into the hole. Then touch this stone and ask the question loudly and clearly."
"If I may advise the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}… In order to be answered, one should take a piece of paper and slide it into the hole. Then touch this stone and ask the question loudly and clearly."

"If I may advise the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}... In order to receive an answer, one should take a piece of paper and slide it into the hole here. Then, touch this stone and ask the question loudly and clearly."

languages.text: “不知我能否提个建议，来自上界的大人……如果您想得到答案，您得抽出一张纸，把它塞进这个洞里，之后按下这个按钮，大声、清晰地问出这个问题。”
languages.original_text: "If I may advise the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}... In order to receive an answer, one should take a piece of paper and slide it into the hole here. Then, touch this stone and ask the question loudly and clearly."

traits.locale_text: “不知我能否提个建议，来自上界的大人……如果您想得到答案，您得抽出一张纸，把它塞进这个洞里，之后按下这个按钮，大声、清晰地问出这个问题。”

languages.text: 「もし天の{mf|君|姫}に進言させていただけるなら…答えを得るには、この紙を1枚取り、ここの穴に差し込むのです。そしてこの石に触れ、質問を大きくはっきりと口にしてください」
languages.original_text: "If I may advise the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}... In order to receive an answer, one should take a piece of paper and slide it into the hole here. Then, touch this stone and ask the question loudly and clearly."

traits.locale_text: 「もし天の{mf|君|姫}に進言させていただけるなら…答えを得るには、この紙を1枚取り、ここの穴に差し込むのです。そしてこの石に触れ、質問を大きくはっきりと口にしてください」

languages.text: «Si {mf|el Señor|la Señora} Celestial tiene a bien que se lo enseñe... A fin de obtener una respuesta, es preciso tomar una hoja de papel e introducirla por esta ranura de aquí. Luego toque esta piedra y formule su pregunta en voz alta y con claridad».
languages.original_text: "If I may advise the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}... In order to receive an answer, one should take a piece of paper and slide it into the hole here. Then, touch this stone and ask the question loudly and clearly."

traits.locale_text: «Si {mf|el Señor|la Señora} Celestial tiene a bien que se lo enseñe... A fin de obtener una respuesta, es preciso tomar una hoja de papel e introducirla por esta ranura de aquí. Luego toque esta piedra y formule su pregunta en voz alta y con claridad».

languages.text: "Semavi {mf|Lordumuza|Leydimize} naçizane tavsiyemdir... Cevap almak için bir parça kâğıdı şuradaki deliğe sokmak gerekir. Sonra da bu taşa dokunup sorunuzu yüksek sesle ve net bir şekilde ifade etmelisiniz."
languages.original_text: "If I may advise the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}... In order to receive an answer, one should take a piece of paper and slide it into the hole here. Then, touch this stone and ask the question loudly and clearly."

traits.locale_text: "Semavi {mf|Lordumuza|Leydimize} naçizane tavsiyemdir... Cevap almak için bir parça kâğıdı şuradaki deliğe sokmak gerekir. Sonra da bu taşa dokunup sorunuzu yüksek sesle ve net bir şekilde ifade etmelisiniz."

languages.text: « Permettez-moi de vous aider, Votre Céleste Seigneurie... Pour recevoir une réponse, il faut d'abord prendre l'une de ces feuilles de papier et la glisser dans cette fente, puis toucher cette pierre et poser sa question à haute et intelligible voix. »
languages.original_text: "If I may advise the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}... In order to receive an answer, one should take a piece of paper and slide it into the hole here. Then, touch this stone and ask the question loudly and clearly."

traits.locale_text: « Permettez-moi de vous aider, Votre Céleste Seigneurie... Pour recevoir une réponse, il faut d'abord prendre l'une de ces feuilles de papier et la glisser dans cette fente, puis toucher cette pierre et poser sa question à haute et intelligible voix. »

languages.text: "Wenn ich {mf|dem himmlischen Herrn|der Himmlischen Herrin} einen Rat geben darf ... Um eine Antwort zu erhalten, müsst Ihr ein Blatt Papier in das Loch hier einführen. Berührt dann diesen Stein und stellt laut und deutlich Eure Frage."
languages.original_text: "If I may advise the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}... In order to receive an answer, one should take a piece of paper and slide it into the hole here. Then, touch this stone and ask the question loudly and clearly."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn ich {mf|dem himmlischen Herrn|der Himmlischen Herrin} einen Rat geben darf ... Um eine Antwort zu erhalten, müsst Ihr ein Blatt Papier in das Loch hier einführen. Berührt dann diesen Stein und stellt laut und deutlich Eure Frage."
